https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/v0uYgoh74LYr6QMz23vurLD7bMP.jpg Hugh Hefner, Stan Lee, Mark Hamill and Kevin Smith journey into the world of comic book fandom! Documentary filmmaker Donald Swan heads to the world's largest comic book convention where he encounters a culture of craziness that he's totally unprepared for. Comic Book: The Movie
